content.html: “What radicalized you against capitalism?” Watching a guy buy the last PS5 in stock in front of me, then immediately walking it across to the CEX to sell it for profit, which CEX then sells for >2x the RRP. From chatting, both stores are under instruction to just allow it.
content.value:
“What radicalized you against capitalism?”

Watching a guy buy the last PS5 in stock in front of me, then immediately walking it across to the CEX to sell it for profit, which CEX then sells for >2x the RRP.

From chatting, both stores are under instruction to just allow it.
